item.title: Python Notes
item.description: 1. Numeric Values >>> 17 // 3 # floor division 5 >>> 17 % 3 # remainder 2 >>> 2 ** 7 # 2 to the power of 7 128 2. Strings Unlike other languages, special characters such as \n have the same meaning with both single ('...') and double ("...") quotes. The only difference between the two is that within single quotes you donâ€™t need to escape " (but you have to escape \') and vice versa.
